def_en: When an actor or entertainer goes offstage, they go into the area behind or to the side of the stage, so that the audience no longer sees them.

def_cn: （戏剧中声效）来自后台的，出自舞台表演区外的
def_en: In a theatre, offstage sounds are produced behind or to the side of the stage, so that the audience hears them but does not see them produced.

def_cn: （演员、表演者）台下的，现实生活中的
def_en: Offstage is used to describe the behaviour of actors or entertainers in real life, when they are not performing.
